definition: to pat/to clap/to slap/to swat/to take (a photo)/to shoot (a film)/racket (sports)/beat (music)
"hand" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 64), occurring in 提, 把, 打 etc

white/snowy/pure/bright/empty/blank/plain/clear/to make clear/in vain/gratuitous/free of charge/reactionary/anti-communist/funeral/to stare coldly/to write wrong character/to state/to explain/vernacular/spoken lines in opera
to auction/auction sale/to sell at a reduced price
to begin shooting (a movie, a scene of a movie etc)/to start the bidding (auction)/to start a trading session (stock market)
to take a picture of a person without permission or without their knowledge
in time with (i.e. same rhythm)/to keep in step with/fig. to cooperate
clapper-board/auctioneer's hammer/to beat time with clappers
to pat/to slap/(of a bird) to flap (one's wings)
lit. to be together from the first beat (idiom)/to hit it off/to click together/to chime in easily

sentences.english: It's such a great film. The director took a lot of care while filming.
sentences.chinese: 電影很不錯，導演拍的時候很用心。

sentences.english: People are clapping, slapping their thighs, stomping the floor.
sentences.chinese: 人們鼓掌，拍着大腿，跺着地板。

sentences.english: Here at Moviefone, we promote a safe work environment.
sentences.chinese: 在拍皇冠網址時，我們創造一個安全的工作環境。

sentences.english: I took a picture so you can see the label.
sentences.chinese: 我拍了張像片所以你們能夠看到這個標籤。

sentences.english: Oh, she said with an overly dramatic hit to her forehead.
sentences.chinese: 哦，她極富戲劇性地伸手拍一下額頭，說。

sentences.english: Then I have patted "the Day Yunshan Legend" with him.
sentences.chinese: 緊接着，我又跟他拍了《天雲山傳奇》。

sentences.english: And here is another, another image by Evans of the bridge.
sentences.chinese: 這是他拍的另一張橋的圖片。

sentences.english: Debate of the two people to play up, drew a group of reporters to surround pat.
sentences.chinese: 爭論中兩人打了起來，引來了一羣記者的圍拍。

sentences.english: Erase and Dodge the edges of the Polaroid picture.
sentences.chinese: 擦除和道奇的邊緣拍立得相片。

sentences.english: To improve your tennis strokes you try using a different grip.
sentences.chinese: 爲了提高你網球的擊球法，你試試用另一種握拍方法。

sentences.english: Monitor took the plane crashed into the Pentagon .
sentences.chinese: 監視器拍下飛機撞進五角大廈的瞬間。

sentences.english: If your using the continental grip, your toss will be slightly over the left shoulder if your right handed.
sentences.chinese: 如果你用大陸式握拍，你的拋球應該稍稍過左肩。

sentences.english: He wirelessed his mother on the way to Japan.
sentences.chinese: 他在去日本的路上給他爸爸拍了電報。

sentences.english: Quickly take a picture with DC then hurry back to the warm cart.
sentences.chinese: 匆忙用數碼相機拍了張照片就鑽回了溫暖的車廂裏。

sentences.english: I wonder if I can send cables without cash payment.
sentences.chinese: 我不知道是否可以不用現款拍發電報。

definition: to sell at auction/to reach a given price at auction
to begin shooting (a movie, a scene of a movie etc)/to start the bidding (auction)/to start a trading session (stock market)
wide expanse/large area/vast stretch/extending widely/blockbuster movie
cast and crew/performers and production team
